channel.title: Did they change the box random?
channel.description: did they change the box random? my aryan isnt doing it xD

item.source: Did they change the box random?

item.title: Did they change the box random?
item.dc:creator: @precise precise
item.description:
@precise wrote:

Actually, just copy Nerice’s entire random folder into Mopar’s random folder and ur all set

Here’s for the challenged that couldn’t piece together 3 simple fragmented sentences:
I have strange box in Mopar’s folder… The box solver still doesn’t work. :
The box solver only doesn’t seem to work with Mopar’s update client.
I looked in the folder and Strangebox was there.

^
----I solved my own problem. The solution is at the beginning of this post.

Read full topic
item.source: Did they change the box random?

item.title: Did they change the box random?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

please learn english

[quote=“sh4d0ws, post:3, topic:1679”]Download the new aryan random pack. Its somewhere here or maybe www.rs-resources.com

the box got changed so colour blind people could solve it.[/quote]

weaselforce:

no, get a pack or if you have “strbox” or something like that replace strange box with it.

not strangebox. with nerices aryan i had a file called “strbox.java” i just copied the code from there into strangebox and recompiled
